alert.note: Alert for Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 2:22PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Tooele County through 300 PM MDT... At 221 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tooele Army Depot to near Skull Valley to 18 miles north of Dugway Proving Ground Test Range. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tooele, Grantsville, Tooele Army Depot, Knolls, Clive, Skull Valley, Utah Test and Training Range South, Stockton, Rush Valley and Erda. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 27 and 54, and between mile markers 70 and 94. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
